# redfox_natip (Resource)

RedFox NatIp
```terraform
resource "redfox_natip" "office" {
  metadata {
    name      = "seoul-office"
    namespace = "offices"
    labels    = {
      "office-type" = "dedicated"
    }
    annotations = {
      "some-annotations" = "some-variable"
    }
  }
  spec {
    ip_type = "Ipv4"
    cidrs   = ["112.250.74.188/32", "114.13.190.240/32"]
  }
}
```
